mapper.select: SELECT BLOG.id as blog_id, BLOG.title as blog_title, BLOG.description as blog_description, BLOG.content as blog_content, BLOG.updated_at as blog_updated_at, BLOG.created_at as blog_created_at, USER.id as user_id, USER.username as user_username, USER.avatar as user_avatar, USER.updated_at as user_updated_at, USER.created_at as user_created_at FROM BLOG LEFT OUTER JOIN USER ON BLOG.user_id = USER.id WHERE BLOG.id = #{id}

SELECT count(*) FROM BLOG
WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BLOG (user_id, title, description, content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{content}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE BLOG SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, description = #{description}, updated_at = now() WHERE id = #{id}
